name: Lost Deck Delux
description:
LOST DECK DELUX Published by 9th Hour Films Games You awaken in a room, but it isn't a quiet one. A blaring CRT video screen and 12 original songs destroy your vision. You feel numb.

Welcome to Lost Deck Delux, a top-down role-playing game in which you play as an innocent finger-boarder seeking out one thing only: The Lost Deck.

There are many things in your way: A Clown, Rabbit, Ninja, The Hellscape Riders and many more...

As a collector of finger boarders, you will gather many collectible fingerboards along your journey which grant your character significant powers such as:

  • Stamina: Decreased Roll Cooldown
  • Power: Increased roll time
  • Agility: Increased speed
  • TIme: More time for collecting decks
  • And a coin score multiplier.

With these great powers, you will forge a board to battle epic enemies that step into your path. While you are just a meager finger-boarder this does not mean you are entirely powerless.

Controls:

[ARROWS] to move, double tap same direction to dodge

[SPACEBAR] to insert a coin

You will be back.
